CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 22, 1967, pg. 13 reads: "Alpha Hymn - Members of Omicron Chapter of Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity joined Charles Highgate in singing the beautiful "Alpha Hymn" during intermission of their recent dance in ballroom of the Pick-Roosevelt Hotel."
TitMainTitle: Alpha Phi Alpha fraternity members including Charles Highgate holding microphone and singing "Alpha Hymn," surrounded by Harold Scales, Larry Davis, Fred Hayes, Mark Milligan, Alonzo Burney, William Spivey, Mr. Saylor, Nate Sims, Robert Daniels, Charles Franklin, Sylvester Stevenson, Jim Crutchfield, Edwin Jackson, Anthony "Tony" Fountain Sr., Tim Stevens, Roy Adams, and Leo Harper during intermission at dance held in Pick-Roosevelt ballroom
